title: Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description:

Expected Result: Tips show in given format
Actual Result: Tips show in one line
OB: When a large content is inserted into a text item and the mouse is placed on it, the tips are displayed on one line instead of the given format.
EB: The tips for a text item with large content should be displayed in the given format.
SR:

1. Insert a text item into the layout.
2. Enter the following contents: 'Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMETNDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTYFILE.
